projects.title: THE GIFTED
projects.copy: The Gifted is an upcoming American television series created for Fox by Matt Nix, based on Marvel Comics' X-Men properties. It is connected to the X-Men film series, the second television series to be so.

projects.copy: The Gifted is an upcoming American television series created for Fox by Matt Nix, based on Marvel Comics' X-Men properties. It is connected to the X-Men film series, the second television series to be so.

projects.title: Color Fall
projects.description: A simple, addicting arcade game for iOS and Android powered devices.
projects.copy: Tap on the left and right side of the screen to change the color of the falling shape. Make sure it has the same color as the conveyor belt at collision time! Be sure to use the triangle previews at the top left and right corners of the screen to help you switch to the appropriate color.
